content: मिथुन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मिथ्-उनन् किच्च <ls>Uṇ. 3. 55</ls>] Paired, forming a pair or conple. --नः <ab>Ved.</ab> A pair, couple. --नं {@--1@} A pair, couple; मिथुनं परिकल्पितं त्वया सहकारः फलिनी च नन्विमौ <ls>R. 8. 61</ls>; <ls>Me. 18</ls>; <ls>U. 2. 5.</ls> {@--2@} Twins. {@--3@} Union, junction. {@--4@} Sexual union, copulation, cohabitation. {@--5@} The third sign of the zodiac, {%Gemini%}. {@--6@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) A root compounded with a preposition.
